Title: Requires all motor vehicle insurers to file annual detailed financial and claim data statements with the superintendent of financial services
Summary: Requires all motor vehicle insurers to file annual detailed financial and claim data statements with the superintendent of financial services; provides that all such statements shall be made available to the public.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring all motor vehicle insurers to file annual financial statements and detailed claim data with the superintendent of financial services
